attributes.action: Make prescription medication free for asthmatic's
attributes.additional_details:
if diabetic's are allowed free prescriptions for their illness and heroin addicts can get free methadone regardless if they are working or not, then why do asthma suffers have to pay for inhalers they need to take regularly to keep on top of their breathing.

We don't choose to suffer from asthma and it should not be a case of going without your inhalers because you cant afford them one month, and risking having a server asthma attack and ending up fighting for your life.

rejection.details: Please see: Abolish prescription charges for asthmatics - The right to breath for free
